statements: DELETE FROM BalanceMonitor WHERE id = 100 AND account_number = 123456
DELETE FROM BalanceMonitor WHERE transaction_type = 'withdrawal' AND transaction_amount > 1000
DELETE FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 10000 AND transaction_type = 'Large Withdrawal';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM AlertLog WHERE account_id = 100 AND alert_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TransactionHistory WHERE transaction_id = 2001 AND transaction_type = 'withdraw';
